meta.title: eaves South Coast - Apartments in Costa Mesa, CA | AvalonBay Communities | AvalonBay Communities

meta.name: title
meta.content: eaves South Coast - Apartments in Costa Mesa, CA | AvalonBay Communities

div.span: Value Living In the heart of Costa Mesa there is eaves South Coast – where sensible apartment living meets a sensible cost of living. We offer quality Costa Mesa apartments with a few little extras, like well-equipped kitchens with brand name appliances and wood plank flooring in kitchens and entryways. Plus, our technology package, eavesConnect, offers high-speed and common area WiFi, TV, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, package service, and more. Located on Paularino Avenue, our Orange County apartment community is conveniently located near the 55, 405 and 73 freeways, as well as John Wayne Airport. Check out delectable local restaurants like Memphsis Soul Case & Bar, Pinot Provence, and Sutra Longue to sample some delectable cuisines, or just spend a day relaxing by hanging out at Fairview Park. Our amenities include a sparkling swimming pool and sport court, and renovated fitness center, conference room, clubroom, and lounge. In other words, our apartments in Costa Mesa offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for. So, what are you waiting for?

a.class: pricing-cw-price font-primary font-weight-bold d-flex align-items-center font-primary-theme
pricing-cw-price font-primary font-weight-bold d-flex align-items-center font-primary-theme

div.class: pricing-content-wrap specials d-flex justify-content-around flex-column z-index-over-content

div.h2: this is the real deal. this is eaves.

a.div: Understanding what you value goes beyond offering you a quality apartment. It means having a respectful, friendly staff that you know you can depend on when you need them. Giving you one less thing to worry about and one more way to feel at home in your new community. That’s eaves.
We know you value convenience. That’s why all of our locations are also carefully selected to put you within reach of local shopping, restaurants and public transportation.

You made a promise to yourself to live within your means. That doesn't mean living without. Take advantage of our special resident discounts, early deposit refund program, and longer lease term options.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

a.div: Don’t worry, we’re best-friendly. See what we do to take pet-friendly living to the next level.

a.div: Homes fully furnished and connected to give you the lifestyle you deserve.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Start earning points on rent with our free residents reward program. Use your points for travel, future rent credit, fitness classes, and more.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, submit a service request, find policies and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

better than you expected.","description":"Value Living In the heart of Costa Mesa there is eaves South Coast – where sensible apartment living meets a sensible cost of living. We offer quality Costa Mesa apartments with a few little extras, like well-equipped kitchens with brand name appliances and wood plank flooring in kitchens and entryways. Plus, our technology package, eavesConnect, offers high-speed and common area WiFi, TV, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, package service, and more. Located on Paularino Avenue, our Orange County apartment community is conveniently located near the 55, 405 and 73 freeways, as well as John Wayne Airport. Check out delectable local restaurants like Memphsis Soul Case & Bar, Pinot Provence, and Sutra Longue to sample some delectable cuisines, or just spend a day relaxing by hanging out at Fairview Park. Our amenities include a sparkling swimming pool and sport court, and renovated fitness center, conference room, clubroom, and lounge. In other words, our apartments in Costa Mesa offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for.
